meanings.definition: A person who attends a banquet.
meanings.sent1: The banqueters enjoyed the delicious food at the banquet.
meanings.sent2: The banqueters chatted and laughed together at the banquet.
meanings.sent3: The banqueters were so hungry, they almost ate the decorations at the banquet!
meanings.sent4: The banqueters were like bees buzzing around a hive, eager to taste every dish at the banquet.
meanings.sent5: The banqueters' laughter filled the banquet hall, creating a joyful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: After the banquet, the banqueters thanked the host for the wonderful evening.
meanings.sent2: The banqueters left the banquet hall with full stomachs and happy memories.
meanings.sent3: The banqueters decided to have a mini-banquet of their own with leftovers from the party.
meanings.sent4: The banqueters, like a flock of birds, dispersed after the banquet, each going their separate ways.
meanings.sent5: The banqueters' attire ranged from elegant gowns to simple suits, adding color to the banquet hall.
